lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
Just when things have really begun to take off with you and ${loverName}, an old boyfriend calls up and begs to speak with you or see you "just one more time."
Your Trustworthy characteristic shows that you can have an intelligent conversation with your "ex" and still maintain your loyalty to ${loverName}.
Your Trustworthy characteristic shows that you might have some conflicts regarding your loyalty to ${loverName}.

Your Thoughtfulness characteristic suggests that you have the self-control necessary to resist him. Your old boyfriend comes on to you strongly, promising that if the two of you ever got back together, things would be totally different.
Your level of impulsiveness suggests that you would not be able to resist the advances he makes. The old flame is rekindled.
#GIVE IN TO THE ADVANCES MADE BY YOUR OLD FLAME
${loverName} eventually finds out and asks you to make a choice. Who would you rather be with?

After three weeks, everything that caused the two of you problems the first time causes even more headaches this time around. Have you forgotten that the two of you really can't stand one another? Don't even think about going back to ${loverName}.
He takes you back, but never completely trusts you again.

Why tempt yourself with something that is certain to open up a closet full of old skeletons? You have made a healthy separation and no longer wish to be involved with your "ex." Seeing him would only reinforce the fact that you still
need each other, in which case he might never stop calling on you for help, favors, etc.
